name: Some Monster Tales
description:
WHAT IS MONSTER TALES?
Monster Tales is an open compilation of games. Each time i have an idea of cool gameplay i will code it and add it to Monster Tales. It could be puzzle game, shooting game, adventure game, this will be a surprise! The content and number of games will then grow over and over.

WHAT'S IN THE BOX DOC'?

A FIREWORKS CUTTING GAME
Cut all the incoming fireworks, protect Helmer and create wonderful fireworks! The game get's harder and harder and fireworks more and more impressive. Be careful, don't let fireworks touch the wall or it will move, reducing the game board size !

A FLYING ADVENTURE
In this 3D side-scroller flying game you will control "Peter-Gabriel" a mini-dragon who doesn't fly very well! Find the best trajectories to go through levels! Be careful you will encounter bad monsters, use the weapons you'll find to get rid of them! Weapons will become more and more powerful each time you pick an upgrade.

A MYSTERY GAME
Unlock this game and discover what finally this game is about!


GAME FEATURES
•New content and games to come
•3 games
•Do perfect score in each level and win stars
•English and French language support

ROAD MAP
•Facebook ranking ( Be prepared for a competition between you and your friends! )
•New levels for the 3D Flyer Game "Flying Pete"
•New games ( Maybe a puzzle game )
•etc...
